verbs.description: [ARG0: shiite muslims] [V: mark] [ARG1: martyrdom of imam hussein story] contains some graphic images the martyrdom of the prophet muhammad grandson is being commemorated by some devout shiite muslims with rituals that include mass flagellation ceremonies ummayid caliph yazid hussein ibn ali muhammad baghdad imam abbas mark martyrdom flagellation karbala pope john paul ii iraq
